short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension helps you simplify operations on Facebook (ADS, BM, Page...) - ffb.vn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check Ads Report:
∟ Display information (ADS account name, balance, limit, threshold, spending total, payment information...).
∟ Display ADS account information in the AdsManger tab and in payment settings (billing_hub).
∟ Decentralize account management rights (Add / Delete) members in bulk advertising accounts.
∟ Delete hidden members (admin) in account (both ADS/BM).
∟ Delete all hidden admins by 1 click.
∟ Rename ADS accounts and search by name or ID or status.
∟ Change bulk account information (name, money, time zone, country, tax).
∟ Notice which ADS account has revived after appeal.
∟ Export excel file of all advertising accounts.
∟ Export to excel file all selected campaigns or schedule them automatically after a period of time.
∟ Share Pixel with many ADS acocunt by 1 click.
∟ View and export excel information table of all business accounts (BM).
∟ Check and delete hidden admins in BM.
∟ Notify if ADS acocunt will be disabled and revived.
∟ Convert all currencies to VND / USD. There is a separate tool in payment settings.
∟ Check the list of credit accounts that have been granted credit.
∟ View and reset ADS acount spending limits.
__________________
Installation instructions (https://youtu.be/6nTgd0ErI9E)
Group FFB.VN (https://www.facebook.com/groups/ffb.vn)
